summary: New characters: Katerina Ivanovna Karamazov. New connections: Katerina–Dmitri (romantic connection), Dmitri–God (child).
summary_short: Introduces Katerina Ivanovna Karamazov. Alyosha Karamazov is the most connected figure (22 ties). Key relationship types: romantic connection, child.
highlights: Most central: Alyosha Karamazov (22), Fyodor Karamazov (21), Dmitri Karamazov (19), Ivan Karamazov (16)
story_summary: Alyosha, despite his father's harsh command, sets off to visit Katerina Ivanovna, feeling uneasy about the meeting. On his way, he unexpectedly encounters his brother Dmitri in a secluded garden, who urgently beckons him to join and share a secret. Dmitri confesses his inner turmoil and love for Alyosha, expressing his complex feelings about life, beauty, and his own nature.
evidence_quotes: his father’s shouts, commanding him to return home “with his mattress and pillow”
Dmitri, mounted on something, was leaning forward, gesticulating violently
